8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet broke (the fast) of Arafah, Umm Fadl sent him some milk to drink

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ صَوْمِ يَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ بِعَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Fast The Day of Arafah While At Arafat
